<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/28f224b2c1bd2fcdee7b4fe2c64826e1cff08f39|patch 8.2.1823: "gN" does not select the matched string>
patch 8.2.1823: "gN" does not select the matched string

Problem:    "gN" does not select the matched string.
Solution:   Move the cursor to the start of the match.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1823: "gN" does not select the matched string · vim/vim@28f224b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1823: "gN" does not select the matched string · vim/vim@28f224b
attachments.text: Problem: "gN" does not select the matched string. Solution: Move the cursor to the start of the match.

patch 8.2.1822: list test doesn't fail

Solution:   Adjust the test for NULL list handling.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/1a73923705744ab8297dd856d194e20297563456|patch 8.2.1821: Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work>
patch 8.2.1821: Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work

Problem:    Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work.
Solution:   Handle a NULL list like an empty list. (closes #7064)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1821: Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work · vim/vim@1a73923
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1821: Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work · vim/vim@1a73923
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: concatenating to a NULL list doesn't work. Solution: Handle a NULL list like an empty list. (closes #7064)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/820d55a50bbc8c0ad0505b7e4302a734896b6bab|patch 8.2.1820: Vim9: crash when error happens in timer callback>
patch 8.2.1820: Vim9: crash when error happens in timer callback

Problem:    Vim9: crash when error happens in timer callback.
Solution:   Check that current_exception is not NULL. (closes #7100)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/85d5e2b723e6fc233e53252dd5c523944146fbc2|patch 8.2.1819: Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure>
patch 8.2.1819: Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure

Problem:    Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure.
Solution:   Compute the mininal refcount in the funcstack.  Reenable disabled
            tests.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1819: Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure · vim/vim@85d5e2b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1819: Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure · vim/vim@85d5e2b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: Memory leak when using a closure. Solution: Compute the mininal refcount in the funcstack. Reenable disabled tests.

patch 8.2.1818: SE Linux: deprecation warning for security_context_t

Problem:    SE Linux: deprecation warning for security_context_t.
Solution:   Use "char *" instead. (James McCoy, closes #7093)

patch 8.2.1817: Vim9: wrong instruction when reusing a local variable spot

Problem:    Vim9: wrong instruction when reusing a local variable spot.
Solution:   Clear a newly allocated local variable. (closes #7080)
